articles.description: Follow live text updates and BBC radio commentary of day two at the US Open as the first round continues.
articles.title: US Open LIVE: Alcaraz, Sinner, Raducanu, Swiatek, Boulter, Draper, Evans - live scores, results, order of play

articles.description: Arsenal complete the signing of Spain midfielder Mikel Merino from Real Sociedad for a fee that could reach £31.6m.
articles.title: Arsenal sign Spain midfielder Mikel Merino from Real Sociedad

articles.description: Manchester United hold exploratory talks over a deal to sign forward Raheem Sterling from Chelsea.
articles.title: Raheem Sterling: Manchester United hold exploratory talks over a deal to sign Chelsea forward

articles.description: Manchester United agree a 50m euros (£42.29m) fee with Paris St-Germain for Uruguay midfielder Manuel Ugarte.
articles.title: Manchester United: Manuel Ugarte set to join from Paris St-Germain

articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo says he will "probably" end his career with current club Al Nassr in the Saudi Pro League.
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo: Portugal star says Al Nassr 'probably' his final club

articles.description: England chief selector Luke Wright says he's sure Jonny Bairstow will "fight his way back" after omitting him from England squads against Australia.
articles.title: England cricket: Jonny Bairstow will fight back from omission, says Wright

articles.description: Crossover boxing is commonplace in the modern era, but it all started in 1976 - with one of the most famous fighters of all time.
articles.title: How Muhammad Ali v Antonio Inoki started crossover fight trend

articles.description: BBC F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your questions following the  Dutch Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 Q&A: Can Lando Norris still narrow gap to win Championship?

articles.description: England name Olly Stone in the side to face Sri Lanka in the second Test and the pace bowler has revealed the role pilates has played in his comeback.
articles.title: England v Sri Lanka: Olly Stone named in side for second Test at Lord's

articles.description: Crystal Palace are closing in on the signing of Arsenal striker Eddie Nketiah for a deal worth in the region of £30m.
articles.title: Eddie Nketiah: Crystal Palace close in on £30m signing of Arsenal striker
